lead_paragraph: Wisconsin cornerback Jack Ikegwuonu, a first-team all-Big Ten selection, and his twin, William, a safety for Northern Illinois, are accused of breaking into an apartment near the Northern Illinois campus in DeKalb and trying to steal an Xbox game console. They were arrested Saturday and face residential burglary and criminal trespass charges, Lt. Jim Kayes of the DeKalb police said.
